name: Rob Portman
tweet_text: This September 11th, I want to take a moment to remember those who died on this day 21 years ago and to express my gratitude to the first responders, military, and intelligence community who have dedicated their lives to protecting us both here at home and abroad.

name: Rob Portman
tweet_text: In the true American spirit, firefighters, police officers, emergency responders, and everyday citizens rose to the occasion to help those who were hurt and suffering, and our brave men and women in uniform took the fight to the terrorists.

name: Rob Portman

name: Rob Portman
tweet_text:
For decades, politicians have talked about addressing our nation’s crumbling infrastructure. 

Today, we are going to deliver. 

In just a few moments, @POTUS will sign the largest infrastructure investment in American history into law.

name: Rob Portman
tweet_text:
The Infrastructure Investment and Jobs Act is good policy focused on investing in our core infrastructure priorities like roads, bridges, ports, broadband and more without any tax hikes. 

It will make a real difference in people’s lives, in Ohio and around the country.

name: Rob Portman
tweet_text:
The Infrastructure Investment & Jobs Act provides $9.2 billion to upgrade & modernize Ohio’s roads and highways - along with special funds to repair our bridges, including the Brent Spence Bridge in Cincinnati. 

This is great news for the Buckeye state.

name: Rob Portman
tweet_text: Looking forward to joining @POTUS at the White House this afternoon for the signing of the landmark bipartisan infrastructure bill to upgrade & modernize our roads, bridges, ports & other key #infrastructure assets -- paving the way for decades of economic growth & prosperity.

name: Rob Portman
tweet_text:
Americans need safe, reliable, and modern infrastructure. 

This bipartisan Infrastructure Investment and Jobs Act delivers it. 

And it does so without raising taxes or increasing inflation.

name: Rob Portman
tweet_text:
The bipartisan infrastructure agreement is designed to create jobs, improve productivity & strengthen our economy - all w/o increasing inflation.

tweet_text: Our country is too deeply divided already & needs to heal from the wounds caused by the attack on January 6 – not divide further due to a partisan commission report.

name: Rob Portman
tweet_text: It’s important that this commission be viewed as nonpartisan and equal, so that Americans can have confidence in its findings.

name: Rob Portman
tweet_text: Leader @SenSchumer assured me that he supported including a proposed amendment by @SenatorCollins which addresses my concerns, Including that Republican appointed vice chair has to approve the staff.

name: Rob Portman
tweet_text: I've made it clear that I can only support the legislation in the end if there are some common-sense changes to ensure the commission is nonpartisan & fair.

name: Rob Portman
tweet_text: I believe an objective, independent outside commission can build on that report and ensure a complete picture for the American people, including why the attack occurred and who was involved. That’s why I voted to move ahead with debate on the legislation earlier this week.

name: Rob Portman
tweet_text: Part of that will be provided the week of June 7, by the joint HSGAC/Rules Committee bipartisan report. I am one of the leaders of that effort which will focus on the Capitol security and intelligence failures leading up to and on January 6.

name: Rob Portman
tweet_text: The January 6 attack on the Capitol was an attack on democracy itself. To keep it from happening again, a fair and objective investigation into what led to the attack, the lack of preparedness at the Capitol, and the slow response on that day are needed.

name: Rob Portman
tweet_text: I have urged my colleagues to join me in supporting my common-sense bipartisan Preventing Disaster Revictimization Act to prevent @FEMA from taking back assistance it has provided to victims of disaster due to an error made by the agency. https://t.co/sTPd5nbEmE

name: Rob Portman
tweet_text: Vaccines are widely available and there are more job openings in the United States right now than at any point in our nation’s history. Let's stop the fed govt disincentive to help folks get back to work and strengthen the economy.https://t.co/u85RxmC3ZH

name: Rob Portman
tweet_text: This #MemorialDay weekend, we join together as a country to honor the brave men and women who have given their lives in defense of the freedoms we all enjoy every day. We will never forget their service and sacrifice.

name: Rob Portman
tweet_text: The Biden admin’s budget calls for $340M for #GLRI, a $10M increase from last year. I will fight for more funding, consistent with the full authorization of $375M enacted through my GLRI Act, which renews the program for the next five years.

name: Rob Portman
tweet_text: I’ve successfully led efforts to restore #GLRI funding when previous administrations of both parties have tried to cut or eliminate it altogether. I will work with this new administration to ensure stable funding to protect this critical initiative.

name: Rob Portman
tweet_text: The Great Lakes are an invaluable resource to #Ohio, and the Great Lakes Restoration Initiative has been a successful public-private partnership that helps protect both our environment and our economy #GLRI

name: Rob Portman
tweet_text: I am proud to have helped lead efforts to keep JSMC Lima viable during a critical time and I will continue to fight tirelessly to keep our military strong and supplied with the best weapons.

name: Rob Portman
tweet_text: The JSMC and our #Ohio workers are not just making our country safer, they’re supporting our allies around the world during some very dangerous times. JSMC Lima is a strategic asset for the United States and its workers are key contributors to our nation’s defense and security.

name: Rob Portman
tweet_text: The best tanks and armored vehicles in the world are made at JSMC, and it is absolutely critical that we maintain funding for the vehicles modified and built at this military facility. #Ohio

name: Rob Portman
tweet_text: It is vital that our troops have the best equipment in the world, which is why our tanks must be continually upgraded. These key modifications are done by the strategic workforce at the Lima Tank Plant. #Ohio

name: Rob Portman
tweet_text: I'm disappointed to see the Biden admin supporting budget cuts for modernization of the Abrams Main Battle Tank at the Lima Joint Systems Manufacturing Center. During the Trump admin we saw increases in the level of modernization funding and the Biden admin is taking a step back.

name: Rob Portman

name: Rob Portman

name: Rob Portman

Businesses in Ohio and across the nation are desperate to find workers. 

We now have vaccines and nearly 8 million job openings. It’s time to stop paying people more to stay home than return to work.

name: Rob Portman
tweet_text: #HSGAC is responsible for oversight of @DHSgov, so it’s crucial that requested documents & materials are provided in full. Today, I secured a commitment from the nominee to be General Counsel that if confirmed he will provide complete & timely oversight materials to #HSGAC.

name: Rob Portman
tweet_text: These positions come with important responsibilities, like addressing the ongoing crisis at our southern border; combating cyberattacks; countering acts of domestic terrorism; & ensuring the agencies within DHS, like @FEMA, are properly prepared to assist during extreme weather.

name: Rob Portman
tweet_text: This morning I delivered opening remarks at a #HSGAC hearing to consider key @DHSgov nominations, including John Tien to be Deputy Secretary, Robert Silvers to be Under Secretary for Strategy, Policy and Plans, & Jonathan Meyer to be General Counsel. https://t.co/fpgj3WdyBQ

name: Rob Portman
tweet_text: “Now is the time to seriously reconsider our policies that send US tax dollars to China only to have our access to critical PPE and other health supplies cut off in a crisis.” The Make PPE in America Act will help to keep taxpayer $$ out of China & support #jobs here at home.

name: Rob Portman
tweet_text: This legislation is so important to US companies and manufacturers that 20 union and industry organizations, including @NCTO, sent a letter to Senate leadership & expressed strong support for the Make PPE in America Act in the US Innovation and Competition Act.

name: Rob Portman
tweet_text: Last week at a #HSGAC hearing, @NCTO agreed that the US is far too reliant on #China for PPE and that we must provide long-term contracts for U.S. manufacturers in order to ensure PPE can be made & distributed here in the US. https://t.co/iAL8VPoiWw

name: Rob Portman
tweet_text:
The US is too dependent on #China for critical public health supplies. 

We have to improve our own national stockpile to be better prepared for future pandemics and the bipartisan Make PPE in America Act will help to do that.

name: Rob Portman
tweet_text:
Carbon capture and direct air capture are common-sense technologies that will enable us to utilize our natural resources while protecting our environment at the same time. 

This is a win-win all the way around. https://t.co/TUqs5dVd0n

name: Rob Portman
tweet_text: Congress needs to take action to lower prescription drug prices for Americans while also preserving incentives to innovate

name: Rob Portman
tweet_text: Heard from Ohioans all around the state this morning who have serious illnesses, rely on life-saving medications and are concerned about what Washington might do to stifle innovation and new treatments and cures. https://t.co/KNnQm6jBoq

name: Rob Portman
tweet_text: We have to ensure that taxpayer investment is secure, and thanks to the Safeguarding American Innovation Act, we can protect the taxpayer investment in American research and IP from theft from global competitors like #China.

name: Rob Portman
tweet_text: The Safeguarding American Innovation Act is included in the U.S. Innovation & Competition Act, which invests more than $100B of taxpayer $$ to solidify US leadership in scientific & tech innovation critical to our nat’l security & economic competitiveness.

name: Rob Portman
tweet_text: This legislation is the result of a year-long, bipartisan investigation I led as Chairman of the Permanent Subcommittee on Investigations that detailed how U.S. taxpayers have been unwittingly funding the rise of China’s military & economy over the last two decades.

name: Rob Portman
tweet_text:
#China has been stealing our military research, IP & technology for decades. And what's worse - we have done little to stop them. 

Last night on the @SenateFloor, I urged my colleagues to pass my bipartisan Safeguarding American Innovation Act. https://t.co/EP6FzJMTEB

name: Rob Portman
